Welcome to KanaSensei!

This little applet will make your learning of Japanese kanas easier.

Click OK to run the applet.

Take a look to the Help menu for directions.




Source code available : kanasensei.zip (21Kb).
Your comments and suggestions are welcome.
You can also report bugs by writing to me at
this address: FBergeron@Rocketmail.COM.
This site has been tested on Netscape 4.0 and Internet Explorer 4.0.
